Cameron Heyward

Cameron Phillips Heyward

Position: DT

6-5, 295lb (196cm, 133kg)

Team: Pittsburgh Steelers

Born: May 6, 1989 in Pittsburgh, PA

College: Ohio St.  (College Stats)

Weighted Career AV (100-95-...): 115 (57th overall since 1960)

High School: Peachtree Ridge (GA)

Draft: Pittsburgh Steelers in the 1st round (31st overall) of the 2011 NFL Draft.

Relatives: Brother Connor Heyward; Cousin Shaka Heyward; Father Craig Heyward

  • 7x Pro Bowl
  • 4x All-Pro
  • 2023 Walter Payton MotY

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Cameron Heyward?

Cameron Heyward is 36 years old.

When was Cameron Heyward born?

Cameron Heyward was born on May 6, 1989.

Where was Cameron Heyward born?

Cameron Heyward was born in Pittsburgh, PA.

How tall is Cameron Heyward?

Cameron Heyward is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much does Cameron Heyward weigh?

Cameron Heyward weighs 295 lbs (133 kg).

How many games does Cameron Heyward play?

Cameron Heyward played 17 games last season and 228 games over his career.

How many sacks does Cameron Heyward have?

Cameron Heyward had 3.5 sacks last season and 92.0 sacks over his career.

How many Super Bowls has Cameron Heyward won?

Cameron Heyward has never won a Super Bowl.
